Height %.tooltip: Changes the height of the player. Vanilla: 100%

Radius %.tooltip: Changes the width & length of the player. Vanilla: 100%

Resize Collider.tooltip: Resizing the player collider will allow the hatchling to fit into smaller spaces, but movement can be a tad buggy when moving against walls.

Enable Stools.tooltip: Adds stools to the solar system to help the hatchling do things that are difficult to do when they are shorter. ENABLING/DISABLING THIS REQUIRES A RELOAD.

Auto-Adjust Stool Height.tooltip: Stools will automatically be scaled to perfectly make up the difference in player height.

Stool Height %.tooltip: How tall stools will be compared to a FULL HEIGHT player. Recommended: 100 minus Player Height. DOES NOTHING IF Auto-Adjust Stool Height IS ENABLED.

Change Pitch Depending on Height.tooltip: The player will be higher pitched when shorter, and lower pitched when taller.

Enable Debug Log.tooltip: Prints certain events to the Outer Wilds Mod Manager console.
